generated_text:
- road: The image shows cobblestone tracks and paved surface where the tram is running, which is part of the road.
- sidewalk: The paved area next to the tram tracks on the right side, adjacent to the stone wall, is designated for pedestrians or cyclists.
- building: The structures on the left and right sides of the image, including the peach-colored building with windows and the stone wall, are buildings.
- wall: The large stone wall on the right side of the image is an individual standing wall.
- fence: The metal railing along the front of the building on the left is a fence.
- pole: There are several vertical poles visible, including those holding traffic signs and street lamps.
- traffic sign: Multiple traffic signs are visible, including a parking sign, a speed limit sign, and a directional sign.
- vegetation: Trees are visible in the background and along the sides of the road.
- person: A person is visible standing next to a bicycle on the right side of the image.
- rider: The person standing next to the bicycle is considered a rider.
- bicycle: A bicycle is visible on the right side of the image, next to the person.
- train: The tram on the tracks is a train.
- car: A car is visible parked in the background on the right side of the image.
